publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7093 James Kelly: Cambuslang and Rutherglen Community Health Initiative—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that Comic Relief has awarded Cambuslang and Rutherglen Community Health Initiative three years’ funding of £120,000; notes that this award will contribute toward the mental health and volunteering work of the initiative, and recognises the hard work and dedication of the staff and volunteers.
S3M-7093 Cambuslang and Rutherglen Community Health Initiative (lodged on 24 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-7093 Cambuslang and Rutherglen Community Health Initiative (lodged on 24 September 2010) Robert Brown*, Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, Trish Godman*, Karen Gillon*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-7093 Cambuslang and Rutherglen Community Health Initiative (lodged on 24 September 2010) Mr Frank McAveety*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-7093 Cambuslang and Rutherglen Community Health Initiative (lodged on 24 September 2010) Bob Doris*, Cathy Jamieson*
